outline:
1. to help
    1. (Qal) to help
  2. to hoe
    1. (Niphal) to be hoed
  3. to be lacking, fail
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to be lacking
      2. to leave lacking
    2. (Piel) to leave lacking
strongs_def: to arrange as a battle, a vineyard (to hoe); hence, to muster and so to miss (or find wanting)
